sentence.text: The short-limbed dwarfism metaphyseal chondrodysplasia cardiac muscle tissue development Schmid (MCDS) is linked to mutations in type X collagen, which increase ER stress by inducing misfolding of the mutant protein and subsequently disrupting hypertrophic chondrocyte differentiation.

In MCDS apoptotic process expressing the Col10a1.pN617K mutation, CBZ reduced the MCDS-associated expansion of the growth plate hypertrophic zone, attenuated enhanced expression of ER stress markers such as cellular response to glucose starvation and response to endoplasmic reticulum stress, increased bone growth, and reduced skeletal dysplasia.
